Photos from Chicago

10 September 2006

The full set of photos from Chicago is now up. Thanks to Simon, Amy and Greg for taking the photos on the day.

Paul May is a researcher and designer from Dublin, living and working in New York. Find out more about Paul's work or get in touch.
